trans-unit.source: If config_context is enabled, by default it's added as a host var named config_context.
trans-unit.target: If config_context is enabled, by default it's added as a host var named config_context.

trans-unit.source: If consolidated, each vGPU is placed on the first physical card with available space. This is the default placement, utilizing all available space on the physical cards.
trans-unit.target: 如果整合，则每个vGPU都将放在具有可用空间的第一张物理卡上。这是默认位置，利用了物理卡上的所有可用空间。

trans-unit.source: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of "0".
trans-unit.target: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of "0" .

trans-unit.source: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of no.
trans-unit.target: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of no .

trans-unit.source: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of yes.
trans-unit.target: If container_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of yes .

trans-unit.source: If createOption=Copy, this is the resource ID of a managed disk to be copied from.
trans-unit.target: If createOption=Copy, this is the resource ID of a managed disk to be copied from.

trans-unit.source: If createOption=Import, this is the URI of a blob to be imported into a managed disk.
trans-unit.target: If createOption=Import, this is the URI of a blob to be imported into a managed disk.

trans-unit.source: If create_mode=non_readable_secondary or create_mode=online_secondary, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果create_mode = non_可读_secondary或create_mode = online_secondary，则忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: If create_option=copy then the value must be greater than or equal to the source's size.
trans-unit.target: 如果create_option = copy，则该值必须大于或等于源的大小。

trans-unit.source: If ct_log is not specified, the certificate uses the account default.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定ct_log，则证书使用默认帐户。

trans-unit.source: If ct_log is set to false, but the account settings are set to "always log", the certificate generation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果ct_log设置为 false ，但是帐户设置设置为“ always log”，则证书生成将失败。

trans-unit.source: If ct_log is specified and the account settings allow it, ct_log overrides the account default.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了ct_log并且帐户设置允许它，则ct_log会覆盖帐户默认值。

trans-unit.source: If default_action=Allow no other settings have effect.
trans-unit.target: If default_action=Allow no other settings have effect.

trans-unit.source: If deploy it means this host should deploy also hosted engine components.
trans-unit.target: 如果部署，则意味着该主机也应部署托管的引擎组件。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a file, the backup file will be saved with that filename. The file extension will always be .tgz.
trans-unit.target: 如果dest是文件，则备份文件将与该文件名一起保存。文件扩展名将始终为.tgz。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a folder, the backup file will be saved in the folder with the default filename generated from the ESXi server.
trans-unit.target: 如果dest是文件夹，则备份文件将使用从ESXi服务器生成的默认文件名保存在该文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If dest is a relative path, the starting directory is determined by the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 如果dest是相对路径，则起始目录由远程主机确定。

trans-unit.source: If detached is false, will include Output attribute containing any output from container run.
trans-unit.target: 如果detached为 false ，则将包含 Output 属性，该属性包含容器运行的所有输出。

trans-unit.source: If disabled this affinity group doesn't take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用，则此相似性组不会生效。

trans-unit.source: If dry_run=False, A request is sent. If the validation succeeds, the instance is created.
trans-unit.target: If dry_run=False, A request is sent. If the validation succeeds, the instance is created.

trans-unit.source: If dry_run=True, Only a dry-run request is sent and no instance is created. The system checks whether the required parameters are set, and validates the request format, service permissions, and available ECS instances. If the validation fails, the corresponding error code is returned. If the validation succeeds, the DryRunOperation error code is returned.
trans-unit.target: If dry_run=True, Only a dry-run request is sent and no instance is created. The system checks whether the required parameters are set, and validates the request format, service permissions, and available ECS instances. If the validation fails, the corresponding error code is returned. If the validation succeeds, the DryRunOperation error code is returned.

trans-unit.source: If dup_ok=True, it will upload the certificate as long as the name is unique.
trans-unit.target: If dup_ok=True, it will upload the certificate as long as the name is unique.

trans-unit.source: If eku is specified, it will override the extended key usage in the CSR.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了eku，它将覆盖CSR中的扩展密钥用法。

trans-unit.source: If encrypt is no, the username and password are sent as a simple XOR scrambled byte string that is not encrypted. No special tools are required to get the username and password just knowledge of the protocol.
trans-unit.target: 如果crypto为 no ，则用户名和密码将作为未加密的简单XOR加扰字节字符串发送。仅需了解协议，就不需要特殊的工具来获取用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: If encrypt=true creates an encrypted file system. This can not be modified after the file system is created.
trans-unit.target: If encrypt=true creates an encrypted file system. This can not be modified after the file system is created.

trans-unit.source: If eni_id=None and state=present, a new eni will be created.
trans-unit.target: If eni_id=None and state=present, a new eni will be created.

trans-unit.source: If error_option=continue-on-error, continue to process configuration data on error. The error is recorded and negative response is generated if any errors occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果error_option =错误继续，则继续处理错误数据。如果发生任何错误，则会记录该错误并生成否定响应。

trans-unit.source: If error_option=rollback-on-error, rollback to the original configuration if any error occurs. This requires the remote Netconf server to support the error_option=rollback-on-error capability.
trans-unit.target: 如果error_option = rollback-on-error，则在发生任何错误时回滚到原始配置。这要求远程Netconf服务器支持error_option =错误回滚功能。

trans-unit.source: If error_option=stop-on-error, abort the config edit on first error.
trans-unit.target: 如果error_option = stop-on-error，则在出现第一个错误时中止配置编辑。

trans-unit.source: If esxi_hostname is provided, then disk information about the given host system will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供esxi_hostname，则将返回有关给定主机系统的磁盘信息。

trans-unit.source: If exact_match is True, it indicates the search_string passed should match a user or group name exactly.
trans-unit.target: 如果exact_match为 True ，则表示传递的search_string应该与用户名或组名完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: If exclude_from_latest=true, Virtual Machines deployed from the latest version of the Image Definition won't use this Image Version.
trans-unit.target: If exclude_from_latest=true, Virtual Machines deployed from the latest version of the Image Definition won't use this Image Version.

trans-unit.source: If fast_forward is set to True, fast_forward will bypass the query processing layer (rewriting, caching) and pass through the query directly as is to the backend server. If omitted the proxysql database default for fast_forward is False.
trans-unit.target: 如果fast_forward设置为 True ，则fast_forward将绕过查询处理层（重写，缓存），并直接将查询直接传递给后端服务器。如果省略proxysql数据库默认FAST_FORWARD是 False 。

trans-unit.source: If field_to_match is header, then header must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果field_to_match是 header ，那么还必须指定 header 。

trans-unit.source: If find_groups is True, domain groups will be included in the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果find_groups为 True ，则域组将包含在结果中。

trans-unit.source: If find_users is True, domain users will be included in the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果find_users为 True ，则域用户将包含在结果中。

trans-unit.source: If force_set_policy=false, it prevents setting a policy that would prevent you from setting another policy in the future.
trans-unit.target: If force_set_policy=false, it prevents setting a policy that would prevent you from setting another policy in the future.

trans-unit.source: If frontend is set to True, this (username, password) pair is used for authenticating to the mysqld servers against any hostgroup.
trans-unit.target: 如果frontend设置为 True ，则此（用户名，密码）对用于针对任何主机组向mysqld服务器进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If iam_certificate_id is set then you must also specify ssl_support_method
trans-unit.target: If iam_certificate_id is set then you must also specify ssl_support_method

trans-unit.source: If iam_certificate_id is set then you must also specify ssl_support_method.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了iam_certificate_id，则还必须指定ssl_support_method。

trans-unit.source: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over destination, vpc_id, type and next_hop for route selection.
trans-unit.target: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over destination, vpc_id, type and next_hop for route selection.

trans-unit.source: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over enterprise_project_id for security group rule selection.
trans-unit.target: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over enterprise_project_id for security group rule selection.

trans-unit.source: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over name, enterprise_project_id and vpc_id for security group selection.
trans-unit.target: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over name, enterprise_project_id and vpc_id for security group selection.

trans-unit.source: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over subnet_id, ip_address for private ip selection.
trans-unit.target: If id option is provided, it takes precedence over subnet_id, ip_address for private ip selection.

trans-unit.source: If ip_address and canonical_name are both omitted when state=absent, then all hosts entries will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 state=absent 时省略ip_address和canonical_name，则将删除所有主机条目。

trans-unit.source: If issuer is empty, any certificate will match.
trans-unit.target: If issuer is empty, any certificate will match.

trans-unit.source: If kdc is already an LDAP URI then this is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果kdc已经是LDAP URI，则将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: If labels_state is replace and labels is not provided or empty then all labels assigned to node are removed and labels_to_remove is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果labels_state为 replace ,并且不提供labels或为空，则将删除分配给节点的所有标签，并忽略labels_to_remove。

trans-unit.source: If local_context_data is enabled, by default it's added as a host var named local_context_data.
trans-unit.target: If local_context_data is enabled, by default it's added as a host var named local_context_data.

trans-unit.source: If match_filter is defined, it will take precedence over the properties, but not on the id
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了match_filter，它将优先于属性，但不优先于id

trans-unit.source: If method is post or get, make the module fail in case an ACME error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果method是 post 或 get ，则在返回ACME错误的情况下使模块失败。

trans-unit.source: If name contains a list of nodes, the output will provide information on all nodes registered at the swarm, including nodes that left the swarm but haven't been removed from the cluster on swarm managers and nodes that are unreachable.
trans-unit.target: 如果name包含节点列表，则输出将提供有关在群集中注册的所有节点的信息，包括离开群集但尚未从群集管理器上的集群中删除的节点以及无法访问的节点。

trans-unit.source: If name is not specified then the module will set the firewall options for all the rules in this group.
trans-unit.target: If name is not specified then the module will set the firewall options for all the rules in this group.

trans-unit.source: If name is set to chocolatey and Chocolatey is not installed on the host, this will be the version of Chocolatey that is installed. You can also set the chocolateyVersion environment var.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称设置为 chocolatey 并且主机上未安装Chocolatey，则这将是已安装的Chocolatey的版本。您还可以设置 chocolateyVersion 环境var。

trans-unit.source: If name is specified, the module will return failed if the identity provider doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: If name is specified, the module will return failed if the identity provider doesn't exist.

trans-unit.source: If name is specified, the module will return failed if the mapping doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: If name is specified, the module will return failed if the mapping doesn't exist.

trans-unit.source: If name parameter format is name:tag, then tag value from name will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称参数格式为name：tag，则name中的标记值将优先。

trans-unit.source: If name=all it works like --all-databases option for mysqldump (Added in 2.0).
trans-unit.target: If name=all it works like --all-databases option for mysqldump (Added in 2.0).

trans-unit.source: If negate_match_pattern is set to True, only queries not matching the query text will be considered as a match. This acts as a NOT operator in front of the regular expression matching against match_pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果negate_match_pattern设置为 True ，则仅与查询文本不匹配的查询将被视为匹配项。这在与match_pattern匹配的正则表达式前面充当NOT运算符。

trans-unit.source: If negativeno VMs in this group should run on the host defined by host_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果为负，则该组中的任何 VM均不应在 host_rule 定义的主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If negativeno VMs in this group should run on the this host.
trans-unit.target: 如果为负，则该组中的任何 VM均不应在此主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If networks parameter is provided, will inspect each network to see if there exists a bridge network with optional parameter com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4. If such a network is found, then published ports where no host IP address is specified will be bound to the host IP pointed to by com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4. Note that the first bridge network with a com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 value encountered in the list of networks is the one that will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了networks参数，将检查每个网络以查看是否存在带有可选参数 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 的网桥网络。如果找到了这样的网络，则未指定主机IP地址的已发布端口将绑定到 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 指向的主机IP 。注意，第一桥网络与 com.docker.network.bridge.host_binding_ipv4 在列表中遇到的价值网络是将要使用的一个。

trans-unit.source: If networks_cli_compatible is set to false, this will not remove the default network if networks is specified. This is different from the behavior of docker run .... You need to explicitly use purge_networks to enforce the removal of the default network (and all other networks not explicitly mentioned in networks) in that case.
trans-unit.target: 如果networks_cli_compatible设置为 false ，那么如果指定了networks，则不会删除默认网络。这与 docker run ... 的行为不同。在这种情况下，您需要显式使用purge_networks强制删除默认网络（以及在network中未明确提及的所有其他网络）。

trans-unit.source: If networks_cli_compatible is set to yes (default), this module will behave as docker run --network and will *not* add the default network if networks is specified. If networks is not specified, the default network will be attached.
trans-unit.target: 如果networks_cli_compatible设置为 yes （默认值），该模块将表现为 docker run --network 如果将*不*添加默认的网络网络中指定。如果网络没有指定，默认网络将被连接。

trans-unit.source: If networks_cli_compatible is set to yes, this module will behave as docker run --network and will *not* add the default network if networks is specified. If networks is not specified, the default network will be attached.
trans-unit.target: 如果networks_cli_compatible设置为 yes ，该模块将表现为 docker run --network 如果将*不*添加默认的网络网络中指定。如果网络没有指定，默认网络将被连接。

trans-unit.source: If new_path or new_name is defined, specifying present will attempt to make an update these.
trans-unit.target: If new_path or new_name is defined, specifying present will attempt to make an update these.

trans-unit.source: If no Instance Type won't be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将“实例类型”设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine will be unset as stateless.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，虚拟机将被取消设置为无状态。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine won't be set as delete protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将虚拟机设置为删除保护。

trans-unit.source: If no Virtual Machine won't be set as highly available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有，则不会将虚拟机设置为高可用性。

trans-unit.source: If offline_domain_join=output the file will be deleted after its contents are returned.
trans-unit.target: If offline_domain_join=output the file will be deleted after its contents are returned.

trans-unit.source: If option is not presented for the interface and state is present option will be added. If option already exists and is not pre-up, up, post-up or down, it's value will be updated. pre-up, up, post-up and down options can't be updated, only adding new options, removing existing ones or cleaning the whole option set are supported
trans-unit.target: 如果选项并不针对该接口和状态是 present 选项将被添加。如果option已经存在并且不是 pre-up ， up ， post-up 或 down ，则其值将被更新。 pre-up ， up ， post-up 和 down 选项无法更新，仅支持添加新选项，删除现有选项或清理整个选项集

trans-unit.source: If org is not specified, the organization from the client represented by client_id is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定org，则使用client_id代表的来自客户端的组织。

trans-unit.source: If ou is specified, it will override the organizational units "ou=" present in the subject distinguished name of the CSR, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定ou，它将覆盖CSR主题可分辨名称中存在的组织单位“ ou =“（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If owner is not defined, the owner will be set as login_user or session_role.
trans-unit.target: 如果业主没有定义，车主将被设置为login_user或session_role。

trans-unit.source: If path is a file or directory, rights can be any right under MSDN FileSystemRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.filesystemrights.aspx.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是文件或目录，则权限可以是MSDN FileSystemRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/zh-cn/library/system.security.accesscontrol.filesystemrights.aspx下的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: If path is a registry key, rights can be any right under MSDN RegistryRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.registryrights.aspx.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是注册表项，则权限可以是MSDN RegistryRights https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.security.accesscontrol.registryrights.aspx下的任何权限。

trans-unit.source: If positiveall VMs in this group should run on the host defined by host_rule.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正，则该组中的所有 VM应在 host_rule 定义的主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If positiveall VMs in this group should run on the this host.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正，则该组中的所有 VM应在该主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: If process_username is not specified, then the remote process will run under a Network Logon under this account.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定process_username，则远程进程将在该帐户下的“网络登录”下运行。

trans-unit.source: If profile is set this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: If profile is set this parameter is ignored.

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of 0. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 0 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 1000 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of 1. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 1 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 3 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of 512. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 512 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of cnd. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为 compatiblity （默认值），这个选项的默认 cnd 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of kvm64. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为 compatiblity （默认值），这个选项的默认 kvm64 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of l26. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为 compatiblity （默认值），这个选项的默认 l26 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of no. Note that the default value of proxmox_default_behavior changes in community.general 4.0.0.
trans-unit.target: 如果proxmox_default_behavior设置为“ compatiblity （默认值），则此选项的默认值为 no 。请注意，proxmox_default_behavior的默认值在community.general 4.0.0中更改。

trans-unit.source: If proxmox_default_behavior is set to compatiblity (the default value), this option has a default of qcow2. If proxmox_default_behavior is set to no_defaults, not specifying this option is equivalent to setting it to unspecified. trans-unit.source: If Ansible were to load ansible.cfg from a world-writable current working directory, it would create a serious security risk. Another user could place their own config file there, designed to make Ansible run malicious code both locally and remotely, possibly with elevated privileges. For this reason, Ansible will not automatically load a config file from the current working directory if the directory is world-writable.
trans-unit.target: 如果Ansible 要从可写入世界的当前工作目录中加载 ansible.cfg ，将带来严重的安全风险。另一个用户可以在其中放置自己的配置文件，该文件旨在使Ansible在本地和远程运行恶意代码，并可能具有较高的特权。因此，如果该目录是可写的，则Ansible不会自动从当前工作目录中加载配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If VM is in UNASSIGNED or UNKNOWN state before any operation, the module will fail. If VM is in IMAGE_LOCKED state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be DOWN. If VM is in SAVING_STATE state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be SUSPENDED. If VM is in POWERING_DOWN state before any operation, we try to wait for VM to be UP or DOWN. VM can get into UP state from POWERING_DOWN state, when there is no ACPI or guest agent running inside VM, or if the shutdown operation fails. When user specify UPstate, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. In other states we run start operation on VM. When user specify stoppedstate, and If user pass force parameter set to true we forcibly stop the VM in any state. If user don’t pass force parameter, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. If VM is in PAUSED or SUSPENDED state, we start the VM. Then we gracefully shutdown the VM. When user specify suspendedstate, we always wait to VM to be in UP state in case VM is MIGRATING, REBOOTING, POWERING_UP, RESTORING_STATE, WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH. If VM is in PAUSED or DOWN state, we start the VM. Then we suspend the VM. When user specify absentstate, we forcibly stop the VM in any state and remove it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行任何操作之前，VM处于UNASSIGNED或UNKNOWN状态，则该模块将失败。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于IMAGE_LOCKED状态，我们将尝试等待VM处于DOWN状态。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于SAVING_STATE状态，我们将尝试等待VM被SUSPENDED。如果在执行任何操作之前VM处于POWERING_DOWN状态，我们将尝试等待VM处于UP或DOWN状态。当VM内没有运行ACPI或来宾代理时，或者关闭操作失败时，VM可以从POWERING_DOWN状态进入UP状态。当用户指定UP state ，我们总是等待VM处于UP状态，以防VM处于MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况。在其他状态下，我们在VM上运行启动操作。当用户指定停止 state ，并且如果用户将 force 参数设置为true时，我们将在任何状态下强制停止VM。如果用户未传递 force 参数，则在VM为MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况下，我们始终等待VM处于UP状态。如果VM处于PAUSED或SUSPENDED状态，我们将启动VM。然后，我们正常关闭虚拟机。当用户指定挂起 state ，我们总是等待VM处于UP状态，以防VM处于MIGRATING，REBOOTING，POWERING_UP，RESTORING_STATE，WAIT_FOR_LAUNCH的情况。如果VM处于PAUSED或DOWN状态，我们将启动VM。然后我们挂起VM。当用户指定不存在 state ，我们会强制以任何状态停止VM并将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If a destination IP address matches more than one IP pattern, the pattern with the longest match is selected, and the associated virtual server processes the request. For example, if the virtual servers, vs1 and vs2, have the same IP pattern, 0.0.100.128, but different IP masks of 0.0.255.255 and 0.0.224.255, a destination IP address of 198.51.100.128 has the longest match with the IP pattern of vs1. If a destination IP address matches two or more virtual servers to the same extent, the request is processed by the virtual server whose port number matches the port number in the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标IP地址匹配多个IP模式，则选择匹配时间最长的模式，并且关联的虚拟服务器将处理该请求。例如，如果虚拟服务器 vs1 和 vs2 具有相同的IP模式 0.0.100.128 ，但具有不同的IP掩码 0.0.255.255 和 0.0.224.255 ，则目标IP地址198.51.100.128与该IP的匹配时间最长 vs1 的模式。如果目标IP地址在相同程度上与两个或多个虚拟服务器匹配，则该请求将由其端口号与请求中的端口号匹配的虚拟服务器处理。

trans-unit.source: If a destination IP address matches more than one IP pattern, the pattern with the longest match is selected, and the associated virtual server processes the request. For example, if virtual servers vs1 and vs2 have the same IP pattern, 0.0.100.128, but different IP masks of 0.0.255.255 and 0.0.224.255, a destination IP address of 198.51.100.128 has the longest match with the IP pattern of vs1. If a destination IP address matches two or more virtual servers to the same extent, the request is processed by the virtual server whose port number matches the port number in the request.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标IP地址匹配多个IP模式，则选择匹配时间最长的模式，并且关联的虚拟服务器将处理该请求。例如，如果虚拟服务器 vs1 和 vs2 具有相同的IP模式， 0.0.100.128 ，但不同的IP掩码 0.0.255.255 和 0.0.224.255 的目的IP地址 198.51.100.128 与VS1的IP模式的最长匹配。如果目标IP地址在相同程度上与两个或多个虚拟服务器匹配，则该请求将由其端口号与请求中的端口号匹配的虚拟服务器处理。

trans-unit.source: If a dict is used, no snake_case conversion is done, so the original PowerShell names must be used.

trans-unit.source: If a dict with the keys name and resource_group, the image is sourced from a custom image based on the name and resource_group set. Note that the key resource_group is optional and if omitted, all images in the subscription will be searched for by name.

trans-unit.source: If a directory matching the name of the role already exists in the current working directory, the init command will result in an error. To ignore the error use the --force option. Force will create the above subdirectories and files, replacing anything that matches.

trans-unit.source: If a directory matching the name of the role already exists in the current working directory, the init command will result in an error. To ignore the error use the –force option. Force will create the above subdirectories and files, replacing anything that matches.

trans-unit.source: If a host is reinstalled and has a different key in ‘known_hosts’, this will result in an error message until corrected. trans-unit.source: If a new enough version of the cryptography library is available (see Requirements for details), it will be used instead of the openssl binary. This can be explicitly disabled or enabled with the select_crypto_backend option. Note that using the openssl binary will be slower and less secure, as private key contents always have to be stored on disk (see account_key_content).
trans-unit.target: 如果有足够新版本的 cryptography 库（请参阅要求，以获取详细信息），它将使用它来代替 openssl 二进制文件。可以显式禁用或使用 select_crypto_backend 选项启用它。请注意，使用 openssl 二进制文件会更慢且安全性较低，因为私钥内容始终必须存储在磁盘上（请参阅 account_key_content ）。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs in the block and the rescue task succeeds, Ansible reverts the failed status of the original task for the run and continues to run the play as if the original task had succeeded. The rescued task is considered successful, and does not trigger max_fail_percentage or any_errors_fatal configurations. However, Ansible still reports a failure in the playbook statistics.
trans-unit.target: 如果块中发生错误且救援任务成功，则Ansible将原始任务的失败状态恢复为运行状态，并继续运行播放，就好像原始任务已成功执行一样。营救的任务被认为是成功的，不会触发 max_fail_percentage 或 any_errors_fatal 配置。但是，Ansible仍报告剧本统计信息失败。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to ${HOME}/.config/lxc/client.crt.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为 ${HOME}/.config/lxc/client.crt 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to ${HOME}/.config/lxc/client.key.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为 ${HOME}/.config/lxc/client.key 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to /home/$USERNAME.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为 /home/$USERNAME 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to 300.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为 300 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to cn=Domain Users,cn=groups,$LDAP_BASE_DN.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为 cn=Domain Users,cn=groups,$LDAP_BASE_DN 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to US.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为US。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to now + duration.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为now + duration。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to now.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为now。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to a generic message that it has been created with Ansible, and a datetime stamp.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,它默认为一个通用的消息,即它已经用Ansible创建,并有一个日期时间戳。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to a value based on UUID4.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则默认为基于UUID4的值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to the current day plus one year.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则默认为当日加一年。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to the remote system's hostname.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,它默认为远程系统的主机名。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to the system hostname as determined by Ruby Socket.gethostname (provided by Sensu).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则默认为由Ruby Socket.gethostname(由Sensu提供)确定的系统主机名。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to the value of the name parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为name参数的值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it defaults to: {'ok': 1, 'critical': 1, 'warning': 1}.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则默认为： {'ok': 1, 'critical': 1, 'warning': 1} 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it will default to the temporary working directory
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,将默认为临时工作目录。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it will fallback to auto.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，它将回退到 auto 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it will slugify the model
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,它将对模型进行slugify。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, lists all jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则列出所有作业。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, no additional parameters are passed
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则不传递其他参数

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the target_origin_id is defined as the target_origin_id of the first valid cache_behavior in cache_behaviors with defaults.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则target_origin_id被定义为target_origin_id第一个有效的cache_behavior在cache_behaviors与默认值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the target_origin_id is defined as the target_origin_id of the first valid cache_behavior in cache_behaviors with defaults.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则target_origin_id被定义为target_origin_id第一个有效cache_behavior在cache_behaviors与默认值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the application pool of the current website will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则使用当前网站的申请池。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default host type will be utilized. Default host type can be set using netapp_eseries.santricity.na_santricity_global.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,将使用默认的主机类型。默认主机类型可以通过netapp_eseries.santricity.na_santricity_global进行设置。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default is pd-standard.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则默认为pd-standard。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default mount point for a given auth method is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则使用给定的认证方法的默认挂载点。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default registry is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,则假定使用默认的注册表。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the disk is created as Standard_LRS.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则将磁盘创建为 Standard_LRS 。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the latest extension version will be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,将创建最新的扩展版本。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the module will follow standard PowerShell convention and use the highest version available.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,该模块将遵循标准的PowerShell惯例,并使用可用的最高版本。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the provider for the service will be mapped to the default provider on the physical network.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,服务的提供者将被映射到物理网络上的默认提供者。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the standard default of 3260 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则使用标准默认值3260。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, then no Joliet support is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则不添加Joliet支持。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, then not add Rock Ridge extension to the ISO.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则不在ISO中添加岩岭分机。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, use resource group location.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则使用资源组位置。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, uses storage_account_name defined one level up.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则使用上一级定义的storage_account_name。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, value of start_ip is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则使用start_ip的值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, value of start_ipv6 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，则使用start_ipv6的值。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will be defaulted to the vlan of the network.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,将默认为网络的vlan。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will fall back to MCP_PASSWORD from environment variable or ~/.dimensiondata.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，将从环境变量或 ~/.dimensiondata MCP_PASSWORD 退回到MCP_PASSWORD。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will fall back to MCP_USER from environment variable or ~/.dimensiondata.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，将从环境变量或 ~/.dimensiondata MCP_USER 退回到MCP_USER。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will use the largest timeout among all backend services associated with the route.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,则使用与途径相关联的所有后端服务中最大的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will use the subscription derived from AzureRMAuth.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定,将使用从 AzureRMAuth 派生的订阅。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will use the tenant of the deployment subscription.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,将使用部署订阅的租户。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, will use the timeout set in HttpRouteAction. If timeout in HttpRouteAction is not set, will use the largest timeout among all backend services associated with the route.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定,将使用HttpRouteAction中设置的超时。如果没有设置HttpRouteAction中的超时,将使用与该路由相关联的所有后端服务中最大的超时。

trans-unit.source: If not supplied this will default to the volume defined in restore
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供，则默认为还原中定义的卷

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, name will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供,将使用名称。

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, the group_name will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供,将使用group_name。

trans-unit.source: If not supplied, will default to name.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供，则默认为name。

trans-unit.source: If not using become or a different auth method to the ones stated above, there will be no default credentials available and no authentication will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用“ become 或与上述方法不同的身份验证方法，则将没有可用的默认凭据，也不会进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If not using become or a different auth method to the ones stated above, there will be no default credentials available and no proxy authentication will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用“ become 或与上述方法不同的身份验证方法，则将没有可用的默认凭据，也不会发生代理身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If not using management vrf, vrf must be globally on the device before using in the pkl config
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用管理vrf,则必须在设备上全局使用vrf,然后再在pkl配置中使用。

trans-unit.source: If omited, will be determined from the name header of the template or the filename (in that order).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，将从模板的 name 标题或文件名（按该顺序）确定。

trans-unit.source: If omitted (null) they will be made top level vars.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略(null),它们将成为顶级变量。

trans-unit.source: If omitted all packages in package.json are installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略package.json中的所有包都会被安装。

trans-unit.source: If omitted during an update, no change is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更新过程中遗漏了,则不做任何更改。

trans-unit.source: If omitted during creation, no value is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建时省略,则不设值。

trans-unit.source: If omitted then all modules will returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略,则会返回所有模块。

trans-unit.source: If omitted then all repositories will returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略,则会返回所有存储库。
